name: Fighter Plane Desert Combat
description:
Fighter Plane Desert Combat is 3D jet fighter planes war simulation games in desert , as an army pilot its your duty to safe your base from incoming enemy planes attack , use long range missiles to shoot down enemy planes.

Rescue your planes from enemy missiles and destroy as many enemy aircrafts as you can,it border area location where enemy deployed most of its troops and planes.

Strike on important location prove your sky battle skills.
